problem_text: Find the perimeter of \triangle R U W if \triangle R U W \sim \triangle S T V, S T = 24, V S = 12, V T = 18 and U W = 21.
compact_text: Find the perimeter of \triangle RUW if \triangle RUW \sim \triangle STV, ST = 24, VS = 12, VT = 18 and UW = 21.
annotat_text: Find the perimeter of $\triangle R U W$ if $\triangle R U W \sim \triangle S T V$, $S T=24, V S=12, V T=18$ and $U W=21$
